markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Dragon](/Traits.aspx?ID=50)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 631 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

Dragons are reptilian creatures, often winged or with the power of flight. Most are able to use a breath weapon and are immune to [sleep](/Traits.aspx?ID=145) and [paralysis](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28).
name: Dragon
